data.title: Draw the line
data.statement: Underscore Robot does not like white spaces and commas in sentences, so it changes all spaces between the words in a sentence (starting always with capital lettered word, and ending with dot {{.}}, question mark {{?}}, or exclamation mark {{!}}) to underscores. Words have exactly one space between each other and it will be changed to one underscore. It does not change spaces between sentences however. There may be sentences with one word only. In the meantime it removes all commas (if any) as well. Given an [[input]] string, write the modified string on the output console.

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn: I am the first sentence. Second one. I am the second! Am I the third?

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: This is one sentence. And another. This is another! Do you want one additional?

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn: Hey, how are you? Thanks, I am good.

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: Heyyo, how you doing? Well, I am doing fine.

data.inputDescription: One string [[input]], containing one or more sentences.
data.outputDescription: One string, all spaces changed to underscores between words in each sentence (except spaces between sentences) and commas removed.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Underscore Robot does not like white spaces and commas in sentences, so it changes all spaces between the words in a sentence (starting always with capital lettered word, and ending with dot ., question mark ?, or exclamation mark !) to underscores. Words have exactly one space between each other and it will be changed to one underscore. It does not change spaces between sentences however. There may be sentences with one word only. In the meantime it removes all commas (if any) as well. Given an input string, write the modified string on the output console.
Input
One string input, containing one or more sentences.
Output
One string, all spaces changed to underscores between words in each sentence (except spaces between sentences) and commas removed.
Constraints
5 < input length < 100
Example
Input
Simple sentence.
Output
Simple_sentence.
